description: The analysis has been revised to address the missing key entities for the `Output Uploader` component and to consolidate related functionalities into a single `Repository & Project Management` component, aligning with the provided "Final component overview". The subsystem boundaries are defined by the functionalities related to Git repository interaction, code preparation, and the publishing of generated outputs. This includes managing repository access, applying ignore rules, generating code differences, and handling the deployment of final artifacts.

components.name: Repository & Project Management
components.description: Provides utilities for interacting with Git repositories, including cloning, checking out branches, managing file filtering based on ignore rules, and generating code differences. It ensures the application can access and prepare the target codebase for analysis. This component consolidates the functionalities of the `Git Repository Manager`, `Ignore Rule Processor`, and `Git Diff Generator`.

components.name: Output Uploader
components.description: Handles the staging and uploading of generated materials (e.g., documentation, analysis reports) by interacting with repository data. This component facilitates the deployment or sharing of the application's output.
